meanings.definition: Establish or originate (an institution or organization)
meanings.sent1: She founds a new school in the town.
meanings.sent2: He founds a charity to help animals in need.
meanings.sent3: The mayor founds a club for gardening enthusiasts.
meanings.sent4: The team captain founds a winning strategy for the game.
meanings.sent5: The artist founds a masterpiece that inspires many.

meanings.definition: To lay the basis or groundwork for (something)
meanings.sent1: They founds the plans for the new building project.
meanings.sent2: She founds the research for her upcoming presentation.
meanings.sent3: The chef founds the recipe for a delicious dessert.
meanings.sent4: He founds the framework for a successful business venture.
meanings.sent5: The teacher founds the lesson with an engaging activity.
